description: [IPsec Helper](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1132) will sleep for a random number of seconds, iterating 200 times over sleeps between one to three seconds, before continuing execution flow.(Citation: SentinelOne Agrius 2021)

external_references.description: Amitai Ben & Shushan Ehrlich. (2021, May). From Wiper to Ransomware: The Evolution of Agrius. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
